ygData.subject: Re: The strange ship.
ygData.msgSnippet: (FYI my ship doesn t have autoguns.) Phobia slipped out the top hatch to avoid being seen, His spider mode pulled the large decimator rifles behind him.

(FYI my ship doesn't have autoguns.)

Phobia slipped out the top hatch to avoid being seen, His spider mode 
pulled the large decimator rifles behind him. "Computer scan area"

The computers voice replied back almost instantly, "Scan complete, 1 
cybertronian lifeform detected."

"Then I won't be needing this," he lowered one rifle back inside the 
ship.

He looked over the side towards where the scans showed Kit Kat (Gimme 
a break, sorry couldn't resist) He transformed to robot and held his 
rifle at shoulders height."State your name and function stranger." He 
knew where she was, she probably knew where he was. It was only his 
advantage if she knew about the weapon he held.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::KitKat::
> 
> She ran in beast mode towards the ship where DarkMouse had told her 
> it was.  She saw the ship in the clearing.  She walked slowly 
towards 
> it. Stopping just short of the autogun range, she opened up her 
link.
> "You in the ship, I was sent to speak to you.  Open up your 
entrance 
> ramp and step out. I was ordered not to open fire until provoked."
> She lied and she knew it.  She transformed into bot mode and pulled 
> her gun out.  She kept it ready by her side just incase.
